com.lucidworks.apollo.pipeline

Interface Context

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.lucidworks.apollo.pipeline.DeprecatedContext, Map<String,Object>, com.lucidworks.apollo.pipeline.PropertyContext

    public interface Context
extends com.lucidworks.apollo.pipeline.PropertyContext, com.lucidworks.apollo.pipeline.DeprecatedContext, Map<String,Object>
    Additional context to pass along with messages in the pipeline
